title: Can't access gameplay section in the in-game shop.
body: The launcher does not show anything after clicking on the gameplay tab except the background behind the shop and the normal top part with "play" and everything. I really wanted to buy some runes to fix a rune page but I guess that is not allowed. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
So uhhhh....I apparently wrote an update and then forgot to hit "post" before stepping away from my desk :/

BUT! I bring updates!  Issue  should be fixed as of ~20-30 minutes ago.  If anyone's still getting a blank "Gameplay" tab, let me know!
I don't know if this is in your section, but when I press  "Gameplay" on the LAN servers nothing pops up...I want to transfer my account back to NA
Checking in on this as we speak! Team's looking into it so I'll update when I know more.
Neither can we in europe west ! bought the rune bundle for nothing...
riot hasnt do anything to fix...
